HOME.DESCRIPTION: Using this tool, you can organize yourself to watch the entirety of the MCU in a few weeks or months! It all depends on how much you want to watch per day.

ORGANIZER.TITLE: Organizer

QUESTIONS.START: When you want to start watching?
